resources.string: The location provider is not enabled!
The permissions required to located your device have not been granted
Could not get the address from the location coordinates
Either the Android Location Framework or Google Location should be selected to locate your device
Unable to use the Google Location service, switching to the Android Location Framework instead
Google API Client is still trying to connect. Try later
Location settings are not satisfied and the system cannot fix them
Location settings have not been changed, so the device cannot be located
